metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26384 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: If an attacker could control the contents of an iframe sandboxed withallow-popups but not allow-scripts, they wereable to craft a link that, when clicked, would lead to JavaScript executionin violation of the sandbox. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 98,Firefox ESR < 91.7, and Thunderbird < 91.7.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
